Package com.madrobot.lang.reflect

Object utilities as well as classes that help with reflection operations on classes, methods, fields and enums.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassLoaderUtils
    A class to centralize the class loader management code.
    ClassUtils
    Operates on classes without using reflection.
    CompositeClassLoader
    ClassLoader that is composed of other classloaders.
    ConstructorUtils
    Utility reflection methods focussed on constructors, modelled after MethodUtils.
    EnumUtils
    Utility library to provide helper methods for Java enums.
    EqualsBuilder
    Assists in implementing Object.equals(Object) methods.
    ExceptionUtils
    Provides utilities for manipulating and examining Throwable objects.
    FieldUtils
    Utilities for working with fields by reflection.
    MethodUtils
    Utility reflection methods focused on methods, originally from Commons BeanUtils.
    ObjectUtils
    Operations on Object.
    ObjectUtils.Null
    Class used as a null placeholder where null has another meaning.
    PackageUtils  
    QNameMap
    Represents a mapping of QName instances to Java class names allowing class aliases and namespace aware mappings of QNames to class names.
    ToStringBuilder
    Assists in implementing Object.toString() methods.
    ToStringStyle
    Controls String formatting for ToStringBuilder.
    TypeUtils
    Utility methods focusing on type inspection, particularly with regard to generics.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CloneFailedException
    Exception thrown when a clone cannot be created.

Package com.madrobot.lang.reflect Description

Object utilities as well as classes that help with reflection operations on classes, methods, fields and enums.
